SQLs.SQL: select * from ( SELECT g.dizhimc, g.dizhibm, COUNT (*) AS allnum FROM cdh_newbornrecord nr left join GY_FUWUJG g on nr.visitunitcode = g.fuwujgbh where 1 = 1 and nr.tianbiaosj >= @日期范围Start and nr.tianbiaosj >= @日期范围End GROUP BY g.dizhibm,g.dizhimc ) jg left join ( select f.dizhibm, sum(case when DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(yy, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<3 and h.screentype = 1 then 1 else 0 end)yiners, sum(case when DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<=28 and h.screentype = 1 then 1 else 0 end)babys, sum(case when DATEDIFF(y, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=3 and DATEDIFF(y, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<7 and h.screentype = 1 then 1 else 0 end)childs, sum(case when DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(yy, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<3 and h.screentype = 1 and h.complex != 1 then 1 else 0 end)yinersno, sum(case when DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<=28 and h.screentype = 1 and h.complex != 1 then 1 else 0 end)babysno, sum(case when DATEDIFF(y, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=3 and DATEDIFF(y, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<7 and h.screentype = 1 and h.complex != 1 then 1 else 0 end)childsno, sum(case when DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(yy, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<3 and h.screentype = 1 and h.complex != 1 and h.recall = 1 then 1 else 0 end)yinersback, sum(case when DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<=28 and h.screentype = 1 and h.complex != 1 and h.recall = 1 then 1 else 0 end)babysback, sum(case when DATEDIFF(y, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=3 and DATEDIFF(y, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<7 and h.screentype = 1 and h.complex != 1 and h.recall = 1 then 1 else 0 end)childsback, sum(case when DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(yy, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<3 and h.screentype = 2 and h.complex != 1 then 1 else 0 end)yinersno2, sum(case when DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<=28 and h.screentype = 2 and h.complex != 1 then 1 else 0 end)babysno2, sum(case when DATEDIFF(y, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=3 and DATEDIFF(y, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<7 and h.screentype = 2 and h.complex != 1 then 1 else 0 end)childsno2, sum(case when DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(yy, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<3 and h.screentype = 2 and h.complex != 1 and h.recall = 1 then 1 else 0 end)yinersback2, sum(case when DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<=28 and h.screentype = 2 and h.complex != 1 and h.recall = 1 then 1 else 0 end)babysback2, sum(case when DATEDIFF(y, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=3 and DATEDIFF(y, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<7 and h.screentype = 2 and h.complex != 1 and h.recall = 1 then 1 else 0 end)childsback2, sum(case when DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(yy, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<3 and h.screentype = 2 and h.complex != 1 then 1 else 0 end)yinersresult, sum(case when DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=0 and DATEDIFF(d, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<=28 and h.screentype = 2 and h.complex != 1 then 1 else 0 end)babysresult, sum(case when DATEDIFF(y, g.birthDay, h.screendate)>=3 and DATEDIFF(y, g.birthDay, h.screendate)<7 and h.screentype = 2 and h.complex != 1 then 1 else 0 end)childsresult from ( select t.* from ( select *, row_number() over(partition by childid, screentype order by createtime desc) as rowindex from cc_hearscreen where status = 1 and inputdate >= @日期范围Start and inputdate >= @日期范围End )t where t.rowindex = 1 )h left join cc_generalinfo g on h.childid = g.childid left join GY_FUWUJG f on h.uploadunit = f.fuwujgbh group by f.dizhibm ) p1 on jg.dizhibm = p1.dizhibm

Source.CountSQL: select count(*) from ( SELECT g.dizhibm FROM cdh_newbornrecord nr left join GY_FUWUJG g on nr.visitunitcode = g.fuwujgbh where 1 = 1 and nr.tianbiaosj >= @日期范围Start and nr.tianbiaosj >= @日期范围End GROUP BY g.dizhibm ) a
